compression.intelligentAnalysis: The compressor doesn't just create a ZIP file of your Minecraft world. It goes much further by intelligently analyzing your world's structure.
compression.removeChunksDesc: Automatically identifies and removes all areas of the world that are not commonly used, significantly reducing file size.
compression.result: The result is about a 50% reduction in original size, keeping all gameplay and progress of your world intact.

steps.analyzeDesc: We examine the structure and detect unused areas
steps.optimizeDesc: Unnecessary chunks and data are removed
steps.compressDesc: Apply advanced compression while maintaining compatibility
steps.readyDesc: Your world optimized, compressed and ready to download

beforeAfter.title: Before and after
beforeAfter.subtitle: (Real examples)
beforeAfter.summary: Save about 50% space on your Minecraft worlds!

free.question: Is it really free?
free.answer: Yes, the Minecraft world compression service is completely free. There are no hidden costs or need to register to use it.

sizeLimit.question: What's the size limit?
sizeLimit.answer: You can upload worlds up to 4GB in size. This limitation is to ensure fast and efficient service for all users.

bedrock.question: Does it work with Bedrock?
bedrock.answer: No, currently the compressor only compresses Minecraft Java worlds 1.2.1 and later.

time.question: How long are files kept?
time.answer: Compressed worlds are stored for 1 hour after compression. After this time, they are automatically deleted from our servers to optimize storage.

share.question: How can I share my compressed world?
share.answer:
Once the compression is complete, you'll be able to share a unique link with your friends.
This link will be valid for 1 hour after the compression is complete.

security.question: Is it safe for my files?
security.answer: Absolutely. Our service processes your files locally and then automatically deletes them after 1 hour. We don't store any personal information or keep copies of your worlds after that period.

ctaSection.title: Ready to compress your Minecraft world?
ctaSection.subtitle: Save space without losing quality

upload.title: Compress your Minecraft world
upload.redirecting: Automatically redirecting to the status page...
upload.clickToRedirect: Click here if you are not automatically redirected
upload.dragDrop: Drag your file here or click to select
upload.howToCompress: How to compress your Minecraft world?

compressMethods.title: These are the 3 valid structures for your ZIP file
compressMethods.method1: ZIP with the world folder inside the ZIP.
compressMethods.method2: ZIP with the world files directly.
compressMethods.method3Subtitle: The first world found will be used

upload.subtitle1: The system will automatically detect your ZIP structure and process the world correctly.
upload.subtitle2: The world name doesn't have to be 'world', and the system returns the result using the first structure (ZIP, folder, world content).

errors.uploadFailed: File upload failed, please try again
errors.connectionError: Connection error, please check your Internet connection

status.title: World Status
status.processing: Your world is currently being processed. This may take a few minutes.
status.queue: Your world is in the processing queue.
status.redirectClick: Click the button to access the download.
status.redirectAuto: We'll take you to the download page automatically.
status.ready: Your world is ready to download!
status.linkExpired: The download link has expired. You can compress a new world to get a valid download link.

errors.processing: Error during world processing. The file may be corrupted or not a valid Minecraft world.
errors.notFound: The world file could not be found for processing. It may have expired or not exist. Please try again.
errors.error: An unexpected error occurred during processing. Please try again or contact support.

download.title: Download Your Compressed World
download.tooltip: This is an approximate date. The link may expire shortly after the indicated time.
download.downloadInfo: The file will be downloaded in ZIP format containing a folder with all the world files.
download.share: Share this world with your friends!
download.takeAdvantage: You can take advantage of this link before it expires to share the world.
download.linkAvailableUntil: The link will be available until
